price: 13. Ma rumeeyaan waxa ku soo arooray (Qur’aanka), dhab ahaanna waxaa hore maray tusaalihii kuwii hore ee tegay6.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: 6. Hannaaka iyo hab raaca Alle waxaa halkan loola jeedaa halaagidda dadka beeniya Rususha Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
